description: Analyzer for BR-10 Safety Data Sheet (SDS) Extract

Supplier.description: Company issuing the SDS (Section 1 header or document header/footer).

MaterialName.description: Product/material name as stated in Section 1 (Identification).

MaterialCode.description: Product code/identifier if present in Section 1 or header.

Revision.description: SDS revision number or date string if provided.

GHSClassification.description: Overall GHS/CLP classification summary from Section 2 (e.g., 'Not classified as hazardous').

HazardStatements.description: List of H-statements or hazard phrases from Section 2, if any (e.g., H315).

WaterActivity.description: Water activity (aw) value if provided in Section 9 or elsewhere. Numeric value only.

INCIComposition.description: Composition entries by INCI name and percent from Section 3 (or equivalent composition table).

INCI.description: INCI name of the ingredient as listed in Section 3.

Percent.description: Percentage by weight for the ingredient. Remove '%' and use '.' as decimal.
